descriptions.app_description: This Telex integration sends a scheduled reminder to a channel, prompting team members to submit their daily (or weekly) standup reports.

key_features: Report template/format guidance in the reminder message.
data.author: Faith Obi

settings.label: Reminder Message
settings.default: Reminder: It's time for your daily standup report!  What have you accomplished since the last stand-up? [What you accomplished here]  What are you working on next? [What you will be doing]  Any blockers? [blocked?]
